Articles.Content:
Out of curiosity, after looking through the cfg, what does the "WarpFactor = 5" mean? Is that the "max speed x c" or something?

I'm already looking at how I could make this a part of my personal edits and stuff that I use, and I'm trying to make sense of some of the more interesting bits in the code.

Out of curiosity, after looking through the cfg, what does the "WarpFactor = 5" mean? Is that the "max speed x c" or something?

I'm already looking at how I could make this a part of my personal edits and stuff that I use, and I'm trying to make sense of some of the more interesting bits in the code.

It's part of the calculation used to compute distance. Warp Factor * throttle (0 to 1) raised to the (i believe, in your version) 10th power. Works out to about 1.67 times the speed of light.

So, what would the effects be of raising and lowering that number? From what you've described, putting larger values there should mean more distance traveled, which should translate to faster warp speeds. Though I imagine faster speeds might cause more anger in the Kraken, or take more resources.
Less resources actually.. faster is more efficient. But yes, kraken. Though I am working on that
So, you go faster, and take less power, but it irritates the Kraken? Sounds a lot like "She'll fly herself apart Captain!" to me. I may have to experiment a bit...

Hmm, I'm running into a weird issue. For whatever reason, whenever I load onto the runway or launchpad, my crafts spontaneously explode once the game loads physics, but only when I equip the Warp Drive. I guess I'll just wait for the finished release to test it again. Patience is a virtue. I tend to clip parts to maintain appearance, but that shouldn't matter under normal circumstances. Either way, that's why it's still in beta.
This mod is great, It works really well. Perhaps in the future we could get smaller or larger warp drives for smaller or larger vessels?

Hmm, I'm running into a weird issue. For whatever reason, whenever I load onto the runway or launchpad, my crafts spontaneously explode once the game loads physics, but only when I equip the Warp Drive. I guess I'll just wait for the finished release to test it again. Patience is a virtue. I tend to clip parts to maintain appearance, but that shouldn't matter under normal circumstances. Either way, that's why it's still in beta.

Is it a saved-craft that you created, and then updated the mod, then tried using again? I've seen some odd cases, where if something subtle changes in the part (collision mesh, node attachment location to the millimeter, not sure what), that might happen (rarely).

Or it could be a symmetry thing. Sometimes a part can get duplicated or corrupted in the VAB, and you need to discard it and pull it from the menu again to get it to work. I have no idea what causes this either.

I only seem to run into these issues when I'm making lots of changes to a part, and running sequential tests with them.

Edited November 22, 2014 by NecroBones

Does anyone else have a problem with the Kraken slapping their .... whenever they try to rendezvous with the warp drive? I launched the drive separately and want to dock a lander to it, but whenever I get within 2km my ship explodes. It's happened with both the Dreamer and the Tantares, so its not the lander's issue.

Any news so far? When can we expect the 3.75 & 5m drives?

Suggestion: make the 5m drive foldable. If the 2.5m drive is any indication, the ring on the 5m is going to be huge.

Any news so far? When can we expect the 3.75 & 5m drives?

Suggestion: make the 5m drive foldable. If the 2.5m drive is any indication, the ring on the 5m is going to be huge.

Wrong thread. There's a release thread that really should be linked in the OP of this thread.

Here's the thread you're looking for. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100798-0-90-Alcubierre-Warp-Drive-%28Stand-alone%29-v0-1-0-2014-12-16

I need this in my life. I need this so badly you have no idea. I've been wanting a standalone Warp Drive for ages.

Not one that I have to download with 50 other parts I'll probably not use, not one that uses weird resource systems and other wonky things, not a jump drive that's just a glorified Hyper Edit with pretty effects, just a warp drive that lets me fly at hilariously awesome and variable speeds in a straight line at multiples of the speed of light. Please, please give me this small wonder in my life. My kerbals will love you for it, and maybe hate me for it because of the inevitable explosions that will follow it its wake. XD

Can I quote this in my signature?
Hey,Zekes, just want to make sure you had seen the answers to the questions you asked about my request? Did you?

Hi rover dude! Can you make a variable size of bubble warp? Bigger the bubble warp will be, bigger is the cost of exotic matter demand. We can make bigger ship or have a variable size of ship with the docking assembly (sorry for my bad english speaking)
